title: Complementary Therapy
description: VTCT Vocational Qualifications in Complementary Therapy prepare you for a rewarding career as a therapist, with elements of Beauty and Sport.
cleaned_text: Complementary Therapy Our Complementary Therapies qualifications range from Level 2 to Level 4 and offer a wealth of career pathways for your learners to choose from. You can choose from wrap-around Complementary Therapy qualifications that cover a range of practices in the field, to specialisms such as Massage. We also offer a range of qualifications in alternative therapies such as Reflexology and Aromatherapy.
